subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: HARRISON, N.Y., June 11 (AP) — Vijay Singh tuned up for Winged Foot with a perfect United States Open-style round at the Barclays Classic on the wind-swept Westchester Country Club course.
snippet: HARRISON, N.Y., June 11 (AP) — Vijay Singh tuned up for Winged Foot with a perfect United States Open-style round at the Barclays Classic on the wind-swept Westchester Country Club course.
